label: VictoryRoadGate_MapEvents.ckir_BEFORE_object_event_MT_SILVER_GUARD
description: Causes Mt. Silver to always be open if you can reach the Victory Road Gate

label: HallOfFame_MapScripts.ckir_BEFORE_clearevent_EVENT_RED_IN_MT_SILVER
description: Changes E4 to not spawn Red to prevent cheese

label: Oak.ckir_BEFORE_setevent_EVENT_OPENED_MT_SILVER
description: Causes Red to be present at Mt. Silver by talking to Oak with enough badges, without needing to defeat the E4
